description: Compress zip files when using ``aws deploy push`` (`issue 1534 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1534>`--)
Fix issue when display error message for multiline shorthand syntax values (`issue 1543 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1543>`__)
Automatically retry Throttling and PriorRequestNotComplete errors (`botocore issue 682 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/682>`__)
Add support for changing the bucket addressing style (`botocore issue 673 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/673>`__)
Add ability to delete customer master keys (CMKs)
